Package org.waarp.icap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IcapClient
    The IcapClient allows to do 3 actions:
    connect(): which allows to initialize the connection with the ICAP server close(): forces the client to disconnect from the ICAP server scanFile(path): send a file for a scan by the ICAP server
    This code is inspired from 2 sources:
    https://github.com/Baekalfen/ICAP-avscan https://github.com/claudineyns/icap-client
    This reflects the RFC 3507 and errata as of 2010/04/17.
    IcapScanFile
    IcapScanFile command to ask an ICAP server to scan a file through network ICAP protocol.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IcapError
    Standard ICAP error code
    IcapModel
    Model parameters for ICAP
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IcapException
    All ICAP exception
